# Depths
## Canada freezer-trawler depth distribution
```{r depth-ca-ft, fig.height = 4, out.height = "85%"}

plot_depth_2_panel(can_ft_gear_depth_df,
                   can_ft_bottom_depth_df,
                   yrs = (last_data_yr - 4):last_data_yr,
                   y_lim = c(0, 800),
                   y_breaks = seq(0, 800, 100))
```
